text: Oblivion is a 2013 American science-fiction movie directed by Joseph Kosinski. It stars Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Andrea Riseborough, Olga Kurylenko, and Melissa Leo. The movie was released in the U.S. on April 19, 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * Category:2013 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:Drone movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the future Category:Movies set in the 21st century Category:Movies directed by Joseph Kosinski
title: Oblivion (2013 movie)
